about_the_game:
Space Chimp

Space Chimp is one of those adventure puzzle games that is quick to grab the attention of gamers with its concept of space and world exploration.

After all, in it, you take the role of Jimmy, an astronaut chimp.

Spread over 7 planets with 40 levels each, you must clear 280 levels, solve mind-boggling puzzles, fight gravity, escape velocity, and special boulders to take Jimmy back to the safety of his home.

Featuring:

- Unique puzzle mechanics to test your logic and cognitive abilities, keeping your brain engaged constantly.
- An engaging gameplay combined with a fantastic art style across 280 levels for hours and hours of play.
- Explore seven interesting planets and experience reverse gravity firsthand!
- Amazing graphics and engaging sound effects for maximum entertainment.
- Awesome soundtrack which is also available for streaming.

Space Chimp provides an immersive user experience as the player journeys with Jimmy across the length and breadth of space, fighting boulders and gravity while solving interesting puzzles of varying difficulty, giving their brains much-needed mental exercise.

Enjoy and let us know what you think about this incredible game!
